item.title: Compile python to exe
item.description: When we write a python file, we can use command line “python test.py” to execute this file, but we need python environment, when publish programs, most user don’t have python in their PC, so sometimes we need to transfer python to executable file, like exe.   Here are two methods to make it. Suppose our code like below: #encoding:utf-8 #test.py if __name__ == "__main__": print("Hello world!")   1. py2exe project
